Interface UserReportRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<UserReportEntity, String>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<UserReportEntity, String>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<UserReportEntity, String>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<UserReportEntity, String>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<UserReportEntity, String>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<UserReportEntity>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<UserReportEntity, String>
@Repository public interface UserReportRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<UserReportEntity, String>

      Count reports against a specific user

    • countUnreviewedReportsAgainstUser

      @Query("SELECT COUNT(r) FROM UserReportEntity r WHERE r.reportedUser.id = :userId AND r.reviewed = false") long countUnreviewedReportsAgainstUser(@Param("userId") Long userId)
      Count unreviewed reports against a specific user
